name: Stripe Checkout
description: Stripe Checkout integration for one-time payments. Includes checkout session creation, webhook handling, and success/cancel pages.

envVariables.name: STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
envVariables.description: Stripe webhook signing secret (starts with whsec_)

usage.configuration: 1. Get API keys from Stripe Dashboard\n2. Add STRIPE_SECRET_KEY, NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY to .env\n3. Set up webhook endpoint and add STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
usage.example: const response = await fetch('/api/checkout', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ priceId }) })

author: vibe-templates
